name: Togedemaru
author: sowsow
flavor_text: When it’s surprised or agitated, the 14 fur spikes on its back will stand up involuntarily.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Random Spark
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
